ygData.subject: Lament rocks, lulaby sucks
ygData.msgSnippet: Lament is one of the most powerful songs in our arsenel (if you can get your group to let you pull that is).  Lulaby is a waste of time.  I prefer to call it
ygData.messageBody:
Lament is one of the most powerful songs in our arsenel (if you can get your
group to let you pull that is). Lulaby is a waste of time. I prefer to
call it "Kelin's suicide" and I refuse to mem it. I flat out told a party
they could all go solo nagafen before I'd bother memming it when they told
me they wanted me to try it.

Lyrnia
----- Original Message -----
From: <beatdropbattledrum@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, July 11, 2000 5:41 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Re: Kelin the dubiously talented song writer


Kelin just suxors! :P Personally, don't waste the time with the song
because I feel it will get you killed more than it will save your
butt. Just my opinions ;)

~Beatdrop

--- In eqbards@egroups.com, Sunski <sunski@b...> wrote:
> Just who was this Kelin anyway? Some sort of sado-masochist?
>
> Hello, I've been a lurker for a little while. Now I'm having a bit
of a problem figuring out what to do
> with Kelin's Lucid Lullaby. I know there's been a lot of
discussion on the list about this song, but
> usually in relation to levels far above mine. I've been meaning to
write this since I got the darn song,
> because I just can't figure out how to use it.
>
> First, my experience with Kelin's Lugubrious Lament. When I first
got that song it didn't work for me at
> all. Always resisted. Consistently got mobbed. But as I've
leveled, it's become more useful. I really
> only try to use it on blues and I'm having a very good success rate
(knock on wood).
>
> Then I get Lullaby and it's even worse than Lament was when I first
got it because I can't see when it
> "hits" them -- I'm just all of a sudden surrounded. I pick a small
group of blues. Run up and turn on
> Lullaby. Nothing. No "resist" message. No "sleepy/whatever"
message. Then they're all wailing away on
> me.
>
> Can someone tell me if I'm doing something wrong or if this song
just really sucks that bad? Should I
> wait a couple (more) levels to start trying to use it? But then I
thought I recalled from previous
> discussion that it's completely useless after level 24? or 27? So
why bother for just a few levels of
> use?
>
> Thanks for any advice.
> Lyressa - level 17
> Nameless
>
> p.s. If I ever run into that Kelin I'm going to have to give him a
piece of my mind. Or maybe my foot --
> soundly on the butt.
